activities:
We provide online training and testing to the employees of multi national companies.  The multi-national companies are our direct Clients.  The online training and testing involves the use of email and other techniques which may use personal information provided by our Clients.  For example, a Client typically will provide the corporate email addresses of their employees or contractors.

The email address data may contain personal information such as first and last names.  The information is used to send email invitations for testing and training purposes that are fully authorized by Client.  

Client has the option to only collect aggregate statistics and to purge Personal Information according to their retention policies.

Chapman Technology Group, Inc. is not authorized and does not use the confidential Client data, including Personal Information, for any purpose not expressly approved by Client for the purposes of training and testing.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: on-line, offline, manually processed.  Does not include human resource data.
